author: Football Italia staff
title: Coronavirus numbers drop again in Italy
description: There were another 604 deaths, taking the total fatalities to 17,127, but Italy have turned a corner in the COVID-19 pandemic with 258 leaving hospital and 106 new intensive care unit beds available.  	These statistics confirm that Italy has reached the peak …
content:
There were another 604 deaths, taking the total fatalities to 17,127, but Italy have turned a corner in the COVID-19 pandemic with 258 leaving hospital and 106 new intensive care unit beds available.
